entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You found all 6 of Rohak's figurines. Well done.
entries.journal_entry_description: Rohak misplaced some of his figurines throughout the area. Maybe you can find them.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: I do enjoy visiting the Adventurers' Guildhall. It's still quite new to Aurilia, but we expect it to thrive and grow in the coming years. Anyone seeking adventure should visit the guildhall from time to time. You shall most assuredly find that which you seek.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: Hmmph, Mellichae is an unpleasant individual. Most unpleasant indeed. It was his capture that ushered in Aurilia's era of peace and prosperity. Had events gone otherwise, I fear our village might have perished.
entries.task06_comm_message_text: I was down here just the other day speaking with Maximillian, our travel consultant. He does a brilliant job of helping everyone get to wherever it is they wish to go.
entries.task08_comm_message_text: I enjoy spending time with these ancient bones. I often wonder about the creature to which they once belonged. One day, I shall have to investigate them more thoroughly.
entries.task10_comm_message_text: Ah yes. I was here looking out across the lands surrounding Aurilia. Well, true, not much can be seen through the fog, but it is that very fog that helps keep Aurilia safe from those who would shatter our newfound peace.
entries.task12_comm_message_text: Ah, I left a figurine by the crystal. I should have realized. This crystal flows with great power. All due to the Force, of course.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: Rohak misplaced some of his figurines throughout the area. Six of them to be exact. See if you can find them.
entries.task14_journal_entry_description: Please wait for just a few seconds as Rohak prepares your reward.
